activities: ALANDA, LLC (“ALANDA”) assists pharmaceutical and medical device manufacturers companies in addressing their regulatory compliance needs by providing automated solutions and supportive consulting services. In providing these services, ALANDA may make use of individuals’ personal information provided to ALANDA by its clients. With respect to such personal information that Alanda does receive from individuals residing in the European Union (“EU”), Alanda complies with the United States-European Union and United States-Switzerland Safe Harbor Frameworks as established by the US Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
